statements: SELECT player_name, score FROM player_scores WHERE tournament_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM player_scores WHERE round_number > 3 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_name, round_number, score FROM player_scores WHERE score > 100 AND round_number < 5;
SELECT tournament_id, player_name, score FROM player_scores ORDER BY tournament_id, score DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, tournament_id, score, round_number FROM player_scores WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT player_name, score FROM player_scores WHERE tournament_id = 1 ORDER BY score DESC, round_number ASC
SELECT player_id, player_name, score FROM player_scores WHERE round_number <= 5 ORDER BY round_number, player_name
SELECT player_id, player_name, score FROM player_scores WHERE round_number > 3 AND score > 100
SELECT * FROM player_scores WHERE player_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY player_name ASC
SELECT player_name, tournament_id, score FROM player_scores WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%' AND score < 50 ORDER BY tournament_id
SELECT * FROM player_scores WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, score, tournament_id FROM player_scores WHERE score > 100;
SELECT player_id, total_wins, total_losses FROM player_statistics WHERE total_wins > total_losses;
SELECT player_id, total_rounds_played FROM player_statistics ORDER BY total_rounds_played DESC;
SELECT player_id, tournament_id, score, date FROM player_scores WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, tournament_id, score, date FROM player_scores WHERE player_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_id, SUM(total_wins) AS total_wins, SUM(total_losses) AS total_losses FROM player_statistics GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_rounds_played > 10;
SELECT player_id, tournament_id, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM player_scores GROUP BY player_id, tournament_id;
SELECT player_id, tournament_id, score FROM player_scores WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT player_id, tournament_id, score, total_wins, total_losses FROM player_scores s JOIN player_statistics p ON s.player_id = p.player_id WHERE total_wins > 5 AND total_losses < 3;
SELECT * FROM player_scores;
SELECT player_name, tournament_id, score FROM player_scores WHERE score > 100;
SELECT player_name, total_rounds_played, average_score FROM player_statistics WHERE total_rounds_played >= 50;
SELECT tournament_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM tournament_info WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT player_name, score, date_played FROM player_scores ORDER BY score DESC, date_played ASC;
SELECT player_name, score, date_played FROM player_scores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY date_played DESC;
SELECT player_name, average_score, best_round_score FROM player_statistics WHERE total_rounds_played >= 50 ORDER BY average_score DESC;
SELECT tournament_name, location, start_date FROM tournament_info WHERE start_date <= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT player_name, score, tournament_name FROM player_scores JOIN tournament_info ON player_scores.tournament_id = tournament_info.tournament_id;
SELECT player_name, total_rounds_played, average_score FROM player_statistics WHERE average_score >= 80 ORDER BY total_rounds_played DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_country FROM players WHERE player_age > 25;
SELECT tournament_name, tournament_location FROM tournaments WHERE tournament_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, player_age FROM players ORDER BY player_age DESC;
SELECT tournament_name, tournament_date FROM tournaments ORDER BY tournament_date ASC;
SELECT player_name, player_country, player_age FROM players WHERE player_country='USA';
SELECT player_name, player_country FROM players WHERE player_age > 25 ORDER BY player_name ASC
SELECT tournament_id, tournament_name, tournament_location FROM tournaments WHERE tournament_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY tournament_date DESC
SELECT player_name, player_country, score_value FROM players INNER JOIN scores ON players.player_id = scores.player_id WHERE score_value > 70 ORDER BY player_name ASC, score_value DESC

SELECT player_name, player_country, fairways_hit, greens_in_regulation FROM players INNER JOIN statistics ON players.player_id = statistics.player_id WHERE fairways_hit > 10 AND greens_in_regulation > 5 ORDER BY player_name ASC

SELECT tournament_name, SUM(score_value) AS total_score FROM tournaments INNER JOIN scores ON tournaments.tournament_id = scores.tournament_id GROUP BY tournament_name HAVING total_score > 500 ORDER BY total_score DESC, tournament_name ASC
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players WHERE player_country = 'USA';
SELECT tournament_name, tournament_date FROM tournaments WHERE tournament_location = 'New York';
SELECT player_name, score FROM players JOIN scores ON players.player_id = scores.player_id;
SELECT player_name, fairways_hit, greens_hit FROM players JOIN stats ON players.player_id = stats.player_id AND fairways_hit > 10 AND greens_hit > 8;
SELECT player_name, player_country FROM players WHERE player_country = 'USA';
SELECT tournament_name, tournament_location FROM tournaments WHERE tournament_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, player_country, score FROM players INNER JOIN scores ON players.player_id = scores.player_id WHERE score > 80;
SELECT player_name, fairways_hit, greens_hit FROM players INNER JOIN stats ON players.player_id = stats.player_id WHERE fairways_hit > 10 AND greens_hit > 5;
SELECT player_name, tournament_name, rank FROM players INNER JOIN rankings ON players.player_id = rankings.player_id ORDER BY rank DESC;
